ceo_buyer.justification: This ASX announcement was approved for release by the Board of Whitebark Energy Limited... Mark Lindh Chairman

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Whitebark has agreed to acquire King Energy via an off-market takeover offer.

currency.justification: The implied value of the acquisition is AUD$1,669,700... all references to $ are in Australian currency, unless stated otherwise.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration is described entirely as shares and options; no cash component is mentioned.

share_payments_raw.justification: Not applicable as calculable share data (number of shares and price) is provided (Priority 2).

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Not applicable as calculable share data is provided (Priority 2).

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Whitebark will issue 100 million new Whitebark shares at a deemed issue price of $0.012 per share...

issued_share_price.justification: Whitebark will issue 100 million new Whitebark shares at a deemed issue price of $0.012 per share...

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The document outlines a forward work program for exploration but does not specify a binding commitment (in meters or value) as part of the acquisition deal terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The document states Whitebark intends to raise capital for exploration, but this is not a contractual commitment within the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Forward work program includes 2D Seismic and Drilling.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: The 'Indicative Project Schedule' chart shows a forward work program including 2D Seismic and Drilling.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty is mentioned as part of this transaction's terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: ...two Petroleum Exploration Licenses comprising 19,467 km2 in the Officer Basin, South Australia (Alinya Project).

coverage_area_unit.justification: ...two Petroleum Exploration Licenses comprising 19,467 km2 in the Officer Basin, South Australia (Alinya Project).

resource_size_desc.value: 4.1 Billion KG Hydrogen (High/P10 Prospective Resource for Rickerscote Prospect)
resource_size_desc.justification: Rickerscote Prospect Resources... Hydrogen KG... High (P10) 4.1 Billion

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Whitebark Energy Limited (ASX:WBE) WBE, Whitebark or the Company)...
